### Features

- ☑️ Modern tech stack with Next.js, Typescript, Tailwind.css, React, Motion.
- ☑️ Modern, clean and minimal design
- ☑️ Scroll triggered animations leveraging the flexibility of [Scroll animation components](https://systaliko-ui.vercel.app/docs/blocks/scroll-animations).
- ☑️ Easy to customize and extend and change the content or the design.
- ☑️ Deployed on Vercel with analytics.

### Depndencies

- Next.js 15
- Typescript 5
- Tailwind.css 4
- React 19
- Motion
- Next Themes

### Sections

- Responsive Header
- Animated Hero Section
- About Section
- Services Section
- Team Section
- Process Section
- Testimonials Section
- Footer
